trans-unit.source: The SOAP representation of a server error.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器錯誤的 SOAP 表示。

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web 服務用戶端將 SOAP 標頭加入至具有的 XML Web 服務方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性設定為`true`，XML Web 服務方法必須設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>屬性`true`，否則<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A> property cannot be set according to the SOAP specification for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A>無法設定屬性，根據 SOAP 規格<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use the SOAP 1.1 specification as the service protocol can use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 1.1 規格的服務通訊協定可以使用的應用程式<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>至存取 SOAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: However, applications that use the SOAP 1.2 specification must use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用 SOAP 1.2 規格的應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>至存取 SOAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method, passing in a SOAP header of type `MyHeader` with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，呼叫 XML Web 服務用戶端`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法，類型的 SOAP 標頭中傳遞`MyHeader`與<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the XML Web service method does not set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML Web 服務方法並不會設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>屬性`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭來`true`、<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含在序列化和還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" />，包含有關序列化資料流之來源與目的端的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> class with parameters for controlling serialization.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制序列化的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 訊息，識別例外狀況發生原因。

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會設定 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 所發生錯誤的類型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The piece of code that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成例外狀況的程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 這通常會是 XML Web 服務方法的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> that contains the contents of the <see langword="<subcode>" /> element of a SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" />，包含 SOAP 錯誤的 <see langword="<subcode>" /> 項目內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> class with the associated data.
trans-unit.target: 使用相關聯的資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
